events.message: I recently received the smartphone I ordered, but the screen has a large scratch and the device sometimes freezes unexpectedly.
The reported issue involves a damaged screen and device malfunction, which corresponds to a Product Defect cluster.
Assigning a technical support agent specialized in hardware defects for further assistance regarding the scratched screen and freezing issues.
Hello! I’m sorry to hear about the problems with your new smartphone. I’m here to help you get this sorted out as quickly as possible.
Could you please provide photos of the scratched screen and let me know if you have tried restarting the phone to see if the freezing persists?
I have attached several photos showing the scratch clearly. I did restart the phone multiple times, but it continues to freeze randomly during use.
We can offer you a replacement device or initiate a repair under warranty. Please let us know which option you prefer, and we will arrange the necessary steps promptly.
Thank you for offering a replacement. I would prefer to receive a new phone as soon as possible since I rely on it for work.
Your replacement phone has been shipped today with expedited delivery. You should receive the tracking information shortly.
We’re checking in to ensure you have received the replacement device and that it meets your expectations without further issues.
The case has been closed following confirmation that the replacement device arrived and is functioning correctly. Thank you for your patience.
